Sales Achievement:    - Achieve and exceed sales revenue targets, with a proven track record of generating over 50 Lakh in sales revenue within a 12-month period.    - Consistently meet and surpass company-set sales targets.   2. column2: As an Enterprise Sales Manager, you will be responsible for sales focused on selling our companys services to large enterprise clients. Your primary goal will be to drive revenue growth, exceed sales targets, and foster strong client relationships. Primarily, you will be solving the below key problems:                                       How to close more enterprise accounts?                                       How to be better at consultative selling?                                       How to increase the conversion ratio?                                       How to get accounts with more recurring revenue and higher billing rates?                                         Key Responsibilities:                                     We strongly believe that in order to solve the above mentioned problems, the activities/responsibilities will keep changing depending on the needs of the hour. We want you to take complete ownership of the sales and then define the activities yourself to meet the goal. Still, to give you a better understanding of the role, here is what we have on the top of our minds:                                     1) Sales Strategy:                                         Develop and execute a strategic sales plan to target and penetrate enterprise-level accounts                                       Collaborate with the executive team to align sales strategies with overall business goals                                         2) Client Relationship Management:                                         Build and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers at enterprise clients                                       Understand client needs, pain points, and objectives to tailor sales pitches and solutions accordingly                                         3) Sales Process Management:                                         Focused on consultative selling                                       Create a list of target accounts and create strategies to generate leads from them and eventually onboard them as clients                                       Oversee the entire sales process, from prospecting to closing deals.                                       Monitor sales pipelines and ensure accurate forecasting of revenue                                         4) Sales Performance Analysis:                                         Analyse sales data and metrics to identify areas for improvement and implement corrective actions                                       Regularly report on team and individual performance to senior management                                         5) Market Research:                                         Stay updated on industry trends, competitor activities, and market conditions.                                       Use market insights to refine sales strategies and product positioning.                                         6) Contract Negotiation:                                         Lead negotiations for complex enterprise contracts, ensuring favorable terms for the company                                                           Skills (Must Have):                                         Experience with target account selling, solution selling, and/or consultative sales techniques. Willing to travel.                                       Minimum 5 years of work experience in enterprise consultative selling (IT solutions, Digital solutions)                                       Demonstrable command of consultative selling skills and an ability to manage complex sales cycles end-to-end                                       High emotional intelligence and the ability to appeal to the varying needs of multiple stakeholders in the sales process                                       Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to persuasively communicate recommendations and effectively champion customer needs                                       Excellent use of insights and reliability around data-driven decision making                                       Excellent organization, project management, time management skills along with an ability to take initiatives                                       Be a good team player

column2: Hi, Greetings from Tridasa Realty ....!!! Position: Sr. Executive / Asst. Manager - CRM Experience: 4 - 8 yrs Location: Hyderabad Job Description: The Customer Relationship Management (CRM) plays a crucial role in maintaining and enhancing customer satisfaction and loyalty through effective management of customer interactions and data. They will collaborate with various teams to ensure seamless integration and utilization of CRM systems to achieve organizational objectives. Key Responsibilities: 1. CRM System Management: * Oversee the implementation, configuration, and maintenance of CRM systems. * Ensure data integrity and accuracy within the CRM database. * Customize CRM modules to meet the specific needs of different departments. * Provide training and support to staff on CRM usage and best practices. 2. Customer Data Analysis: * Analyze customer data to identify trends, preferences, and opportunities for improvement. * Generate reports and insights to support decision-making across departments. * Collaborate with marketing and sales teams to develop targeted campaigns and promotions. 3. Process Improvement: * Continuously evaluate and optimize CRM processes to enhance efficiency and effectiveness. * Identify automation opportunities to streamline workflows and reduce manual efforts. * Work closely with IT teams to implement system enhancements and upgrades. 4. Customer Engagement: * Develop and implement strategies to enhance customer engagement and satisfaction. * Monitor customer feedback channels and take proactive measures to address issues. * Coordinate with customer service teams to ensure timely resolution of inquiries and complaints. 5. Cross-functional Collaboration: * Collaborate with marketing, sales, and customer service teams to align CRM initiatives with overall     business objectives. * Serve as a liaison between different departments to facilitate information sharing and collaboration. * Participate in cross-functional projects and initiatives as needed. Qualifications: * Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Information Technology, or related field. * Proven experience 5 yrs in CRM administration or related roles. * Strong understanding of CRM principles, practices, and technologies. * Proficiency in CRM software such as Salesforce, Microsoft Dynamics, or similar platforms. * Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data sets. * Strong communication and interpersonal skills. * Detail-oriented with a focus on accuracy and data integrity. * Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, collaborative environment. * Project management experience is a plus. If interested, please do quick reply with updated CV and along with below details. Total experience: CCTC: ECTC: Notice period: Reason for change:
column11: real estate, CRM

column2: As the    C       ustomer Onboarding Manager     , you will report to the    Team Lead       , Customer Onboarding     , and will be responsible for e   nsuring the successful execution of the ZoomInfo customer onboarding strategy and accelerating customer adoption of ZoomInfo s products and solutions. The Onboarding Manager works with the customer success team, the customer training team, and the customer integrations team to put together effective project plans, including goals, timelines, and resource coordination to ensure quick ROI for ZoomInfo customers. This is a high-visibility role within an exciting area of the business with a chance to quickly make a difference.             The responsibilities of this opportunity include:         Manage the comprehensive onboarding for all ZoomInfo customers (including new business, renewals, and upsells) to ensure customers receive a highly organized program with detailed goals, timelines, and processes. Serve as primary point of contact for customers during the onboarding and implementation phase of the customer lifecycle.     Build implementation strategies to ensure customers in all customer segments are onboarded within the defined SLAs. Coordinate communication with other areas of the business to ensure a streamlined approach for each and every customer.     Work directly with customers to set appropriate expectations, address customer goals, determine target dates, manage customer tasks, and provide regular project updates during the onboarding phase of the customer lifecycle.     Collaborate with the customer success team, customer training team, and customer integrations team to create a streamlined and cohesive approach that allows customers to get successfully implemented and trained.     Manage multiple simultaneous onboarding projects at one time, balancing priorities of business results, customer satisfaction, and technical quality. This includes being an asset to the Customer Success Manager, Learning & Development Manager, and Integrations and/or Solutions Engineer while being an advocate for the customer.     Provide best practices and mentorship to customers on how best to implement ZoomInfo s suite of products and solutions. Provide thought leadership with regards to overcoming challenges the customer is facing.     Ensure appropriate handoff of new accounts to the Customer Success Manager and/or the Account Manager. Build out a standardized information flow/transition document to prepare the CSM and AM for success, including documenting wins and challenges the customer faced during the onboarding process.     Serve as the primary owner of Customer Journey tasks in Salesforce. Document all steps and touchpoints as appropriate.     Perform a wide variety of professional tasks, which demand a high level of creativity and imagination, as well as a thorough knowledge of the applicable needs and expectations of employees/customers.         A successful candidate will have the following qualifications:         BA/BS degree. At least 2+ years of customer success and/or project management, ideally in a SaaS environment.     Ability to manage multiple competing priorities, rapidly adapt and respond to customer requests and timeline changes.     Highly collaborative, organized, and execution-oriented with strong presentation skills.     Excellent project management skills with an emphasis on attention to detail, timelines, and quality of work.     Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to be flexible to project situations. Ability to research, analyze and provide a solution to newly identified issues.     Experience developing, installing, training, and/or supporting B2B solutions (previous experience with ZoomInfo and/or ZoomInfo certification strongly preferred).     Highly familiar with Salesforce CRM.     Able to be successful in a fast-paced environment that rewards hard work and self-motivation.     Superior relationship and communication skills (both verbal and written).
column11: Training, Usage, Resource coordination, Customer satisfaction, Project management, Manager II, Management, Salesforce CRM, Auditing, Recruitment

column2: We at Innovaccer are looking for a Clinical Transformation Operations Specialist to support the Clinical Transformation Team in driving operational excellence across the external-facing Innovaccer University tool. You ll get to work with other CT and Product team members to build out and update a challenging and engaging training environment that enables our customers to thrive and grow.       A Day in the Life       Work with the CT Team to build out the curriculum for Innovaccer University, maintaining the content within the courses to match the Product Release schedule     Manage the Docebo (LMS System) relationship in conjunction with the Sales Enablement Team Specialist to ensure the platform is appropriate for both internal and external consumers     Maintain Innovaccer University s certification planner, tracking the enrollment, completion and partial completion of courses     Develop a plan to grow adoption of the Innovaccer University tool, with strategic initiatives identified to drive usage of the tool     Measure the effectiveness of the certification pathways across the customer base.     Work with the team to develop new certification methodologies and challenges that ensure an environment of continuous learning     Create and design various reports and dashboards for tracking training and certification compliance     Co-support the third party vendor relationships that help build and update Innovaccer University curriculum/content     Collaborate with Product Teams, ensuring all training materials are up-to-date with the latest and greatest material.           What You Need         Strong organizational and planning skills; patience and respect are a must     Strong skills with Google suite applications, especially excel/sheets for operational reporting     Ability to learn and navigate PM tools (managed by 3rd party vendors)     Ability to self-manage, focus and prioritize under moderately stressful conditions     1-4 years of experience or study in corporate training, marketing, sales or engineering fields     A genuine interest in Healthcare and/or Marketing, or Sales, or Learning is preferred     Comfortable working US shift hours or hybrid schedule US/IST schedule     Strong interpersonal and communication skills     Proficiency in Learning Management Systems and Project Management applications     Bachelor s degree is a prerequisite         Preferred Skills         Engineering, or Marketing, or Sales and/or corporate operations or training background is preferred     Experience in certifications/or assessment based enablement in past roles     Project Management - Handling multiple work streams- understanding of agile work practices     Stakeholder management skills     Understanding and knowledge of SaaS based product and sales cycle     Organization and time management skills; dedication to completing tasks/projects in a timely manner     Detail-oriented and attitude to follow through     Self starter comfortable working independently     Adaptability and flexibility- comfortable with continuously changing priorities     Analytical thinker who proactively anticipates next best action

To identify, prioritize and pursue new opportunities in focussed area as defined by organisation. 7. Support finance team on time billing and collection. 8. Updating project status to management. 14. Monthly BD progress presentation (monthly review meeting) 15. Tracking request for proposals. 16. Maintain the timeline /duration with respect to communication both internal and external client.  Additional Responsibilities: 1. Activities to be performed with the compliance of ISMS requirements by means of maintaining the confidentiality, integrity and availability of data and information. 2. Maintenance, updating and oversee of website.  3. Market communications  4. Update the corporate presentation on regular interval.

column2: Get involved in the sales process with the sales team. Understand the clients requirements and map it with the HubSpot capabilities.         Evaluate a customers current tech stack, recommend an onboarding approach, and develop a 90 day plan to lead the customer to long term success.         Post sales closure, ensure customer success and be the primary point of contact for 10-12 client onboardings and related projects/activities.         Advise clients on HubSpot best practices and work with clients to guide their initial HubSpot setup.         Provide advice and recommendations for marketing and sales best practices, business process, product configuration / set up, and technology integrations. Work with development team to get the plan executed.         Provide the training to the customer s marketing/sales team to how to use HubSpot and best practices.         Responsible for project management and the coordination of tailored inbound campaigns and strategies.         Responsible for creating implementation project schedules, coordinating deliverables, facilitating resources         Help to identify client s business objectives, challenges, and key success metrics.       Requirements         BE/MBA and 2+ years of related experience.         1+ years of HubSpot experience.         2+ years of project management experience.         Experience in client-facing roles and managing a portfolio of clients.         Have a strong technical aptitude, with a good understanding of integrations, APIs, and relational database concepts.         Can manage several customer engagements simultaneously, balancing the needs of multiple customer stakeholders, and ensure successful and timely completion.         Have a strategic mindset and can help customers with their long-term planning.

column2: Our vision for Pre-Sales Engineering is to build ""The words best experiential technology sales team"".  Pre-Sales Engineering Mission: We are the trusted technical partner for our clients. We show value by delivering a co-creation experience in order to progress opportunities to client purchase. The PTS delivers this mission and vison through by developing partner technical capacity for both Ecosystem Partners and for the Select Client Segment. As a Partner Technical Specialist, your mission is to influence and develop the Ecosystem technical capacity to positively generate repeatable scale that ultimately is reflected in an increase in IBM's revenue. Your technical expertise (measured by skill and delivered via POX) is what differentiates you, and IBM, in the ecosystem space. Through this expertise, you expand our ecosystem partner and clients business horizons for your speciality (Data & AI) Your Role and Responsibilities As a Brand Partner Specialist- Territory, your mission is to navigate IBM Ecosystem programs to bring the right brand technical, co-marketing, and go-to-market enablement assets which drive prospecting, opportunity identification, or solution co-creation with your assigned Partners. By aligning territory planning, demand generation, lead passing, and sales execution between IBM Digital Sales and Partners you grow revenue in your assigned Brand portfolio by increasing Partner SELL Motion activities for your Select territory. Responsibilities Develop Partner territory plans to identify strategic growth areas, revenue objectives, enablement goals, key Partners. Engage IBM local country/market sales teams, Digital Sales teams, marketing, and technical teams to accelerate Partner success. Engage directly with Partners and their Clients in support of high value engagements and opportunities. Augment Partner and Client engagements with IBM's breadth of capabilities, connecting Partner with the extended Ecosystem sales team as needed. Maintain strong relationships with IBM Partner Technical Specialists to align sales efforts with offering capability roadmaps. Grow sales margin by expanding Partner expertise in selling on value vs price, and use knowledge of Technology Decision Points and Brand offering roadmaps to enable Partners to develop follow-on sales strategy. #ISATECHS24 #IBMReferred_India Required Technical and Professional Expertise Minimum 4-7 years of experience in Automation technologies  Ability to co-sell with Partners in front of Clients Influence Client's & Partner's Technology Decision Ability to create a territory plan for, communicate with, and advise Business Partners Knowledge of Tools & Processes which accelerate the sales cycle, including knowledge of technology pricing/subscription models. Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills, and an ability to collaborate effectively with Ecosystem Partners, clients and sales professionals.  Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise Technical skills in IBM's Automation Portfolio to support partner's Sell opportunities Experience of successfully engaging with Ecosystem Partners and clients to identify, progress and win IBM Technology sales opportunities. Demonstrate how IBM Technology addresses Client, Market, and Industry trends are relevant to the partner, looking for ways to increase cross-sell opportunities for the partner.
column11: python, plc, automation testing, sales, selenium, rpa, macros, hmi, maven, manual testing, selenium webdriver, scada, sql, ansible, vba, powershell, jenkins, uipath, testng, process automation, api testing

column2: Company Overview: FAIR PACK MACHINERIES, is a leading manufacturer of innovative packaging solutions, offering a wide range of automatic and semi-automatic VFFS, HFFS, and PFS machines tailored for pouches, sachets, bottles, jars, trays, and bags. We are committed to delivering excellence and efficiency to our clients across various industries. Job Description: We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Sales Development Representative (SDR) to join our dynamic sales team. We are particularly looking for women candidates to help diversify our team and bring unique perspectives to our sales efforts. The ideal candidate will be responsible for generating leads, engaging with potential clients, setting meetings for our sales representatives, and ensuring smooth communication and follow-ups between the sales team and clients. This role is pivotal in driving our sales efforts and expanding our market presence. Responsibilities: - Generate new business leads and manage the sales pipeline. - Initiate contact with potential clients via email, phone, and other communication channels to set up meetings. - Provide detailed information about our products and services to prospects. - Schedule and coordinate meetings for sales representatives with potential clients. - Follow up on leads and maintain relationships with potential clients until closure. - Work closely with sales representatives to ensure they are well-informed of client needs and expectations. - Maintain accurate records of all sales activities and client communications in the CRM system. - Assist in creating sales presentations and materials. - Stay updated on industry trends and competitors. Requirements: - At least 2 years of experience in sales or business development, preferably in the manufacturing sector of packaging machines (VFFS, HFFS, and PFS). - Proven track record of generating leads and meeting sales targets. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. - Strong organisational skills and the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously. - Proficiency in CRM software and Microsoft Office. - Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field. What We Offer: - A competitive salary and performance-based bonuses. - Opportunities for professional growth and advancement. - A collaborative work environment with a supportive team. - Access to training and development programs. How to Apply: Interested candidates can either apply through naukri.com, or are invited to submit their resume and a cover letter outlining their qualifications and experience to sales@fairpack.in. Please include Sales Development Representative in the subject line of your email. We strongly encourage women candidates to apply.

column2: CRM Customer Relationship Management | | WebKrit Infocom      CRM (Customer Relationship Management): Nurturing Connections and Driving Growth      Customer Relationship Management (CRM) is a strategic approach that focuses on building and nurturing strong relationships with customers, clients, and prospects.      Through the use of technology, processes, and data, CRM enables organizations to effectively manage interactions, enhance customer experiences, and drive business growth. It encompasses a range of activities aimed at understanding, engaging, and retaining customers while optimizing operational efficiency.      Customer Data Management: Collecting, storing, and managing customer information to gain insights into preferences, behaviors, and needs.      Sales Automation: Automating sales processes, lead tracking, and customer interactions to streamline sales efforts.      Marketing Automation: Utilizing technology to automate marketing campaigns, personalized communications, and customer segmentation.      Customer Support: Providing timely and personalized support through multiple channels to address inquiries and resolve issues.      Analytics and Reporting: Analyzing data to measure performance, track customer interactions, and derive actionable insights.      Integration: Integrating CRM systems with other business tools, such as email marketing and e-commerce platforms, for seamless operations.      Data Collection: Gathering customer data from various touchpoints, such as websites, social media, and interactions.      Segmentation: Categorizing customers based on demographics, behaviors, and preferences for targeted engagement.      Personalization: Delivering personalized experiences and content based on customer profiles and interactions.      Automation: Automating routine tasks, such as email follow-ups and lead tracking, to optimize resource allocation.      360-Degree View: Creating a holistic view of each customer s interactions and history to enhance understanding and engagement.      Customer Loyalty: Effective CRM fosters strong relationships, leading to increased customer loyalty and repeat business.      Enhanced Customer Experience: Personalized interactions and timely support create positive experiences for customers.      Sales Efficiency: Streamlined sales processes and automated tasks increase sales team productivity.      Data-Driven Insights: CRM analytics provide valuable insights for informed decision-making and strategic planning.      Targeted Marketing: CRM enables targeted and relevant marketing campaigns, boosting effectiveness.      Improved Collaboration: CRM systems facilitate collaboration among teams by centralizing customer information.      Sales Management: Tracking leads, opportunities, and sales interactions to optimize the sales process.      Customer Support: Managing customer inquiries, requests, and issue resolution for enhanced support.      Marketing Campaigns: Segmentation and personalization for effective email marketing and advertising.      E-commerce: Tracking customer interactions and behaviors to tailor online shopping experiences.      Data Privacy: Ensuring compliance with data privacy regulations and securing customer data.      Adoption: Encouraging teams to embrace and effectively use CRM systems can be a challenge.      Integration: Integrating CRM with existing systems and tools requires careful planning and technical expertise.      Customization: Tailoring CRM systems to fit unique business processes and needs.
column11: Automation, Data management, Email marketing, Social media, Strategic planning, Data collection, Customer support, Operations, Analytics, CRM

column2: As an International Lead Generation Executive at Xcellence-IT, you will be responsible for effectively performing outreach to target prospects in defined geographies.     Your role will involve conducting targeted surveys to identify the right business opportunities from prospects.     You ll demonstrate a strong eye for research, scouting for new prospects, identifying key players in industries, and gathering interest.     Engaging in meaningful conversations with key decision-makers and business owners will be a significant part of your responsibilities.     You will work closely with the sales and marketing teams, routing qualified meetings to the appropriate sales executives for further development and closure.     Your role demands qualities like being a self-starter, a team player, high energy, reliable, and having a strong work ethic.         ?       Roles & Responsibilities   :      ?       Lead Identification and Research:         Effectively perform outreach searches to target prospects in defined geographies.         Conduct targeted surveys to identify the right business opportunities from prospects.         Demonstrate a strong eye for research to scout new prospects and identify key players in industries.       Outreach and Engagement:        Initiate contact with leads through email campaigns, cold calls, social media, and other communication channels.         Craft compelling and tailored messages to capture leads interest and communicate the value of our products/services.         Engage in meaningful conversations with key decision-makers and business owners.       Qualification and Nurturing:       Qualify leads based on established criteria and assess their potential as viable opportunities.         Collaborate with the sales team to ensure a seamless handover of qualified leads for further sales processes.         Implement lead nurturing strategies to maintain engagement with prospects who are not yet ready to make a purchase.       Collaboration with Sales and Marketing:       Work closely with the sales and marketing teams to align lead generation strategies with overall business goals.         Provide valuable insights and feedback from lead interactions to improve targeting and messaging strategies.       Reporting and Analysis:       Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of lead generation activities, interactions, and outcomes.         Generate regular reports on lead generation performance, including metrics such as conversion rates and lead quality.       Qualifications:       Bachelor s degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field.         Proven experience as a Lead Generation Executive or similar role, preferably in an international context.         Strong understanding of lead generation strategies, techniques, and tools.         Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.         Proficiency in using CRM systems and lead management software.         Self-motivated, proactive, and able to work independently.         Demonstrated aptitude for technology and sales.         Strong work ethic, reliability, and willingness to accommodate job timings based on campaign needs.       Preferred Qualifications (not mandatory):       Additional language skills relevant to target international markets.         Experience in B2B lead generation within the SaaS field.         Familiarity with marketing automation tools.

Duties and Tasks of Your Particular Role         Technical Expertise:           Develop a deep understanding of our technology solutions, including their features, benefits, and competitive advantages. Solution & Proposal Presentations.         Work closely with the sales team to participate in pre-sales activities, including client meetings, presentations, and demonstrations. Excellent presentation and communication skills, with the ability to convey complex technical concepts in a clear and compelling manner. column2: Our Client Relationship Executives will develop relationships with potential clients through cold outbound calls, and establish and maintain professional rapport with them by being on the front lines. About us:        ATC (American technology consulting) is a global company, with a mission to enable our customers to solve the most challenging problems using technology and design. We accomplish this with our family of SAAS products and services.      We are headquartered in the United States with branch offices in Dubai, India, and now, Ukraine. A technology company in IT services, we have multiple product companies within ATC.      Through ATC Ventures, we fund inventive entrepreneurs with a passion for SaaS products and have built multiple tech startups from the ground up.      With our startup incubator known as, Startup Studios, we partner with entrepreneurs and businesses to build products that solve everyday problems through the creative use of technology. We nurture client efficiency not only through the custom products we build for their organizations but with the automation opportunities we identify through expert business analysis. column2: "Our vision for Pre-Sales Engineering is to build ""The words best experiential technology sales team"".  Pre-Sales Engineering Mission: We are the trusted technical partner for our clients. We show value by delivering a co-creation experience in order to progress opportunities to client purchase. The PTS delivers this mission and vison through by developing partner technical capacity for both Ecosystem Partners and for the Select Client Segment. As a Partner Technical Specialist, your mission is to influence and develop the Ecosystem technical capacity to positively generate repeatable scale that ultimately is reflected in an increase in IBM's revenue. Your technical expertise (measured by skill and delivered via POX) is what differentiates you, and IBM, in the ecosystem space. Through this expertise, you expand our ecosystem partner and clients business horizons for your speciality (Automation) Your Role and Responsibilities Technical skills in Automation Portfolio to support partner's Sell opportunities. Working with Ecosystem Partners, influence clients' technology strategy through IBM Brand Solution proposals, technical proofs, and compelling value propositions. Win with Ecosystem Partners against competitors by co-developing a superior technical solution and delivering maximum client business value. Proactively identify and engage with Ecosystem partners to progress technology opportunities in your territory resulting in the successful sale and deployment of IBM Solutions Co-sell and collaborate with Ecosystem partners to deliver winning solutions to our clients. Required Technical and Professional Expertise Minimum 4-7 years of experience in Automation technologies. Experiential selling including co-creation and hands-on technical sales methods such as: demos, custom demos, Proofs of concept, * Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) or other technical proofs Build deep brand (Data & AI) expertise to assist partners to deliver PoX (Custom Demo, PoC, MVP, etc.) to progress opportunities. Identifying partners with skills, expertise, and experience Identify partner capacity and assist partners in building capacity Defining actions, plays, campaigns and resources to Build the Territory Partner Capacity Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills, and an ability to collaborate effectively with Ecosystem Partners, clients and sales professionals.  Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise Technical skills in IBM's Automation Portfolio to support partner's Sell opportunities Experience of successfully engaging with Ecosystem Partners and clients to identify, progress and win IBM Technology sales opportunities. Demonstrate how IBM Technology addresses Client, Market, and Industry trends are relevant to the partner, looking for ways to increase cross-sell opportunities for the partner.

column2: At POD - Josh Technology Group, We are seeking talented and experienced Client Engagement professionals to join our team. You will be responsible for building and maintaining strong relationships with colleges and universities across the country. You will play a crucial role in ensuring client satisfaction, retention, and maximizing business opportunities. The primary objective is to enhance the overall client experience by providing exceptional service and support throughout the lifecycle. Required   Experience: 1-5 years of experience in Client Servicing Experience Work   Location: Pune - Remote/Work From Home (2 Saturdays in a month are working) Qualifications: Bachelor's/Masters degree in any relevant eld Mandatory   Prerequisites:  Willing to travel to cities outside of Job location.  Must know the regional language - Marathi   Who   are   we? POD.ai (formerly known as Calyxpod) is a software product by Josh Technology Group and was launched in 2017. Since its inception, POD has seen exponential growth and established itself in the industry. POD aims to become the market leader in the recruitment technology and assessment industry. JTGs' extensive design and engineering experience are critical to the quality of PODs work and its ability to deliver elegant, highly scalable solutions. We lay a very strong emphasis on quality mentorship & learning. POD is a growing team of technology consultants and innovators. We have a highly talented peer group that is very well respected in technology. We work in small scrum teams with a focus on fast iterations to deliver value. What   do   we   do? Pod provides Campus Placements Management Solution to Corporates to run all their Campus Placements Related Activities, Walk-In Drives, and On-Going Lateral Hirings. Pod helps Companies to engage with all their partners & measure the value provided by them. Pod provides Placements Management Solutions to Colleges & Universities. Pod helps Colleges to run all their Placements Related Activities by Engaging Students, Faculty & Companies. JTG is a bootstrapped organization that has multiple fully owned software products. JTG acts as a Product Builder for multiple US & UK-based startups. JTG has successfully created and launched more than 100 products, spread across various industries, and is working on many more exciting new ones. It has been 14+ years since its inception & JTG has been protable from day 1 & aspires to reach new heights. Core   Responsibilities:  Act as a pivotal point of contact for the Training & Placement Department on behalf of the corporates.  Resolve their queries while using the portal.  Connect with the TPOs of colleges/universities across the country & pitch the relevant career opportunities of the clients for their students.  Effectively communicate with the internal & external stakeholders and ensure that the information is being communicated in a timely manner.  Connect with colleges on a daily basis to solicit interest in accordance with client's requirements.  Assist engagement managers and corporate engagement team in planning, scheduling, and executing recruitment drives and other campus activities.  Ensure the recruitment drives or any college activities related to the platform are being effectively conducted.  Ensure client satisfaction with the organization's products & services.  Maintain high engagement levels with clients(Placement Team and Students) What   are   we   looking   for   in   you?  Possess excellent Interpersonal and Communication Skills.  Possess the ability to build long-term relationships with clients.  Ability to multitask and to prioritize under deadline.  Expert in delivering outcomes.  Self-starter and a good team player with a high sense of ownership.  Client-centric and a positive attitude and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.  Self-motivated and has an internal drive to produce high-quality work.  Good working knowledge of Microsoft & G Suite. A   stellar   performer   who:  Has the desire to make it BIG.  Is Self & Goal Driven, Quick Thinker, Action-Oriented, and Diligent.  Has good Interpersonal skills and a Go-Getter personality.  Has an eye for detail and good cognitive skills.   Maintains Integrity and Professionalism in work. How   will   you   grow   here?  Opportunity to build good relationships with the Training and Placement department of colleges.  Work & interact directly with senior directors in an open and at hierarchical structure.  Freedom & a plethora of opportunities to introduce new things in the organization.  Opportunity to Get Mentored by the Best. POD   thanks   you   with  Events, activities, and outings (We really party hard!).  A stimulating and energetic work environment that encourages creativity.  Hackathons, Gaming Evenings, Poker Nights, and much more!  Flexible Timings, Flexible Holiday Calendar.  Competitive salary (best in the industry).   Recreation center to let off some steam.  Medical Insurance (stay healthy, stay happy)

Participate in Splores    Sales Process   : Actively involve yourself in the entire sales process, from generating leads to finalizing deals. column2: Job Summary:  As a Customer Relationship Manager (CRM) at Ridhira Group, you will be responsible for building and maintaining strong relationships with clients throughout the transaction process. You will serve as a trusted advisor, providing personalized support and guidance to clients to ensure their satisfaction and loyalty. Responsibilities: Client Engagement: Act as the primary point of contact for clients, addressing their inquiries, concerns, and needs in a timely and professional manner. Build rapport and establish long-term relationships with clients by understanding their preferences, goals, and expectations. Provide detailed information about properties, neighborhoods, market trends, and investment opportunities to help clients make informed decisions. Transaction Management: Facilitate the real estate transaction process from initial inquiry to closing, ensuring smooth and seamless execution. Liaise with internal teams, including sales agents, brokers, legal advisors, and lenders, to coordinate documentation, inspections, appraisals, and other necessary steps. Negotiation and Representation: Assist clients in negotiating purchase agreements, lease agreements, and other contractual terms to achieve favorable outcomes. Represent clients' interests throughout negotiations, advocating for their needs and objectives while maintaining professional relationships with counterparties. Client Support and Follow-Up: Provide ongoing support and assistance to clients post-transaction, addressing any issues or concerns that may arise. Conduct follow-up calls, emails, and meetings with clients to ensure their satisfaction and identify opportunities for additional services or referrals. Market Research and Analysis: Stay updated on real estate market trends, property values, inventory levels, and regulatory changes affecting the industry. Conduct market research and analysis to identify potential opportunities and risks for clients, offering strategic advice and recommendations. Customer Feedback and Relationship Management: Gather feedback from clients to assess satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement in service delivery. Maintain accurate records of client interactions, preferences, and transactions using CRM software or other tracking tools. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in real estate, business administration, marketing, or a related field (preferred). Real estate license or certification required. Proven experience in customer service, sales, or relationship management, preferably in the real estate industry. Strong communication, interpersonal, and negotiation skills. Knowledge of real estate laws, regulations, and procedures. Proficiency in CRM software, Microsoft Office Suite, and other relevant tools. Ability to multitask, prioritize tasks, and work effectively in a fast-paced environment. Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail. Working Conditions: Regular office hours with occasional evening or weekend work required to accommodate client schedules and property showings. Travel may be necessary to attend property viewings, client meetings, and industry events. Conclusion:  As a Customer Relationship Manager in the real estate industry, you will play a vital role in ensuring client satisfaction, fostering loyalty, and driving business growth through personalized service and strategic support. Your dedication to building strong relationships and delivering exceptional service will contribute to the success and reputation of [Real Estate Company Name].

column2: Position Title    : Sales Coordinator/ Customer Support Executive   Reports To (Position Title)   : Sales Director  Company    Winoa Abrasives India    Overview   Customer Service Executive is the link between the sales team , customers & Supply Chain department. B2B portal India mart Lead generation management, sending introductory mail, initial prospecting and passing on leads to sales team. Follow up on the progress and generating reports   Assist in implementing marketing initiative including mail campaigns, exhibitions, web portal updating etc.  Supporting sales team in pre sales & post sales activities including coordination for collection/ modification in documentation.  Perform proactive customers service by ensuring follow-up calls to customers (late orders, usual orders, ), collecting forecast, checking situation when order are missing,    Ensure credit limit control and other financial checks related to customers situation.   Coordination with sales team, customer and SCM starting from PO review to safe execution.  Maintaining sales tracker , generating reports to analyse sales trends, customer buying trends with an eye on churn.  Maintaining customer master data, regular updating and utilizing same for sales promotion activities Position Dimensions (Scope) (e.g. reporting structure, personnel responsibility, decision-making authority, budget responsibility)   Hierarchal Reporting to Sales Director having functional alignment with Supply Chain   Pre & post sales & marketing support to Sales team  Customer Complaint management in co-ordination with Sales & technical team   Credit management and Cash collection   Contributions to launch products   Deploy marketing and sales Strategy, program and activities as directed  Contacts ( internal/external)     Internal All level of management in India & Global headquarter, Product Application team , SCM team, Accounts team   External Customers at all levels in user group, purchasing group & management level  Other  (travel, working conditions, unusual work schedules) Keen to join a business enterprise, which requires a high flexibility at work and a pragmatic & solution-oriented mindset such as varied working conditions  High telephone volume, hectic pace, the customer expectations of quick, accurate answers Must deal with constant deadlines and changing priorities Essence is Office Time Punctuality & Standards for attendance is 98% Extensive work at computer terminals Expected to be mobile & flexible such as having own 2 wheeler and driving license must be used to travel to different local agencies on own 2 Wheeler as & when required Candidate Profile (Education, Experience, Requirement   )    Education & Experience: Graduate preferably from Science/ Commerce background with 3-5 years experience in similar profile in B2B environment, preferably industrial consumable business  Knowledge of MS Office tools with experience in MS Excel, Power point & Outlook   Excellent communication skills - both written & verbal  Experience in customer relationship management   Knowledge of e commerce , India Mart & other B2B portals Soft Skills ( behavioural , manual, self expression, planning, organizing):    English & Hindi fluent. Knowledge of additional language will be added advantage.  Comfortable with Microsoft Office Suite and collaborative tools such as word, excel, PP , ERP, MS Packages   Team worker, reliable, good communicator,   Honesty and integrity, Rigorous,   Autonomous and curious, analytical and pedagogical skills   Excellent presentation and communication skills (both written and spoken)   Collaborative style, enjoys being part of a team   Respect values: Business code of conduct and Group compliance Policies   Autonomous, good ability to structure and organize. Ability to analyse, synthesize and to handle complex situations.   Motivated and positive, she conveys trustful and professional image towards customers.   Care for customers satisfaction  Communication skills (verbal / nonverbal) and active listener: ability to collect relevant information, build strong relationship  Contact : vineet.wahi@winoa.com (Mob : +91 9582805047) / sales.india@winoa.com

column2: Job Summary: We are seeking a dynamic and customer-focused individual to join our team as a Customer Service Executive for our cutting-edge cybersecurity products. The ideal candidate will be responsible for delivering exceptional customer support, addressing inquiries, troubleshooting technical issues, and ensuring overall customer satisfaction. Responsibilities: 1. Provide first-class customer support for our cybersecurity products via phone, email, and chat. 2. Assist customers with product-related inquiries, troubleshooting, and problem resolution. 3. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to escalate and resolve complex technical issues. 4. Maintain a thorough understanding of our cybersecurity products to effectively address customer queries. 5. Document and track customer interactions and resolutions in the CRM system. 6. Conduct product training sessions for customers to enhance their understanding and usage. 7. Collaborate with the product development team to relay customer feedback and contribute to product improvements. 8. Stay updated on industry trends and security threats to better assist customers with their concerns. 9. Provide timely and accurate information to customers regarding product updates, releases, and maintenance. 10. Strive to meet and exceed customer satisfaction goals and key performance indicators. Qualifications: 1. Proven experience in customer service. 2. Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to convey technical information to non-technical users. 3. Familiarity with cybersecurity concepts and products. 4. Problem-solving skills and the ability to think critically in high-pressure situations. 5. Experience using CRM systems and other customer support tools. 6. Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams. 7. Detail-oriented and committed to delivering a positive customer experience. 8. Flexibility to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. 9. Graduate in any stream. If you are passionate about cybersecurity, customer service, and making a positive impact, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity. Join us in our mission to protect and empower our customers in the digital landscape.

column2: As a Customer Relations Executive, you will play a pivotal role in lead generation, lead management, and fostering organic business growth from existing customers. Your responsibilities will extend to providing valuable insights to the marketing team and supporting the MIS analyst in lead analysis. Collaboration with the sales team will be essential for lead conversion and achieving organizational targets.             Key Responsibilities:         1. Lead Generation and Management:   Identify Potential Leads: Identify potential leads received from various channels such as market research, industry events, social media, and inbound inquiries.   Qualify Leads: Assess the quality and fit of leads based on predetermined criteria to prioritize efforts effectively.   Capture Lead Information: Maintain accurate records of lead information including contact details, interactions, and stage in the sales cycle using CRM software.   Lead Nurturing: Develop and engage prospects and move them through the sales funnel, utilizing personalized communication and relevant content.   Follow-Up: Ensure timely follow-up with leads through email, phone calls, or other communication channels to maintain engagement and address queries or concerns.   2. CRM:   Customer Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with existing customers to understand their evolving needs and preferences.   Identify Up-selling/Cross-selling Opportunities: Analyze customer purchase history, behavior, and feedback to identify opportunities for up-selling additional products or services or cross-selling complementary offerings.   Referral Programs: Encourage satisfied customers to provide referrals through incentives or loyalty programs, leveraging existing relationships to generate new leads.   3. Collaboration with Marketing:   Data Gathering: Collect and consolidate data related to lead generation, customer interactions, and sales performance from various sources.   Segmentation: Assist in segmenting the customer base to tailor marketing messages and offers to specific audience segments for maximum relevance and impact.   Feedback Loop: Act as a conduit between the customer-facing teams and the marketing department, providing valuable feedback on customer preferences, pain points, and competitive insights.   4. Collaboration with Sales:   Alignment: Work closely with the sales team to understand their goals, target markets, and   challenges in converting leads into customers.   Support: Provide sales team members with the necessary resources, information, and support to effectively engage and convert leads.   Feedback Loop: Share insights from customer interactions and lead management activities with the sales team to optimize their strategies and tactics for lead conversion.       Qualifications:     Bachelor s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field.   Must-Have:   Experience with CRM software for lead management (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot).   Proven experience of 5 years in customer relations, lead generation, or sales support roles.   Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.   Strong convincing and negotiation skills.   Ability to multitask and prioritize in a fast-paced environment.   Team player with a proactive and results-oriented mind-set.   Good to Have:   Familiarity with statistical analysis and reporting tools (e.g., Excel, Tableau).   Previous experience in B2B sales environments.   Certification in customer relationship management or related fields.

column2: ServiceNow is currently seeking an Enterprise Account Executive to join the Sales team in West, India, driving new business revenue for the telco sector across the region. This will be achieved by territory planning, using business development techniques and field-based sales activities in conjunction with working effectively with our Go To Market partners within the territory and by engaging with the ServiceNow eco system to ensure success in generating revenue opportunities and effective closure of sales opportunities. Being the trusted advisor to the customer and or Go To Market Partner by understanding their existing and future IT roadmap to drive the ServiceNow solution within the marketplace     Building and maintaining relationships with key executives and decision makers       Job Requirements         Demonstrable track record of achieving and exceeding new business sales targets within the telco sector     Previous high performing new business sales experience gained within software or IT s

column2: Role & responsibilities   Description: You will start your journey at BYJU as a Student Success Specialist to guide students who are using BYJU's App Learning Program and be an integral part of their learning journey with BYJU. Your key role is to connect regularly with students and parents and ensure that they have a seamless and effective experience with BYJU. Responsibilities 1. Mentor the students assigned to you throughout your Byju's Journey to ensure they are engaged with the product and material. 2. Guide the learner through their academic journey by directing them to the appropriate resources, quality information, and academic learning. 3. Use numerous contact channels (phone, chat, and video) to mentor and involve students and parents. 4. Monitor and analyze student performance dashboards to show students' overall development. 5. Constant inspiration and counseling are used to drive kids' academic and extracurricular achievement and performance. 6. Enable students and parents to engage with and utilize the app to the fullest. 7. Under the supervision of your management, ensure that daily, weekly, and monthly objectives are met. IMPORTANT NOTE: (A) Objective: 5 hours of talk time per day, 60 customer connections, and 150 or more dialed calls. (B) Working hours: 10.00 AM to 8.00 PM (C) During the week, two days off(Rotational Weekoff), Saturday and Sunday is mandatory working  Preferred candidate profile   Mothers are only eligible for this work-from-home Role. Must be a Graduate. This position requires a laptop and access to good Wi-Fi at home. Language Required: English as Prime, Kannada, Bengali, Marati as Regional Fluent. Max age 35. Perks and benefits   3.5 LPA + INCENTIVES NOTE:  Eligible Applicants can reach out  Mail: jeevan.nagaraju@byjus.com Phone: +91 91484 41018 / +91 72048 53332

Negotiate contracts and agreements with clients to ensure mutually beneficial partnerships. Continuously monitor market trends, competitor activities, and industry developments to identify opportunities for growth. Marketing Strategy: Develop comprehensive marketing plans and campaigns to promote stainless steel tubes and pipes. Utilize a mix of online and offline marketing channels, including social media, email marketing, trade shows, and advertising, to reach target audiences. Create engaging marketing materials such as brochures, presentations, and product catalogs. Collaborate with the marketing team to optimize website content, SEO, and digital marketing efforts. Analyze marketing data and metrics to evaluate the effectiveness of campaigns and make data-driven decisions. Market Research and Analysis: Conduct market research to identify potential customers, market trends, and growth opportunities in the stainless steel industry. Analyze customer demographics, preferences, and purchasing behavior to tailor sales and marketing strategies. Monitor competitor activities and pricing strategies to stay ahead in the market and adjust strategies accordingly. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Engineering, or related field. Proven experience in sales and marketing, preferably in the stainless steel or metal industry. Strong understanding of stainless steel tubes and pipes, including their applications, specifications, and manufacturing processes. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. Proficiency in MS Office suite and CRM software. Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and make strategic recommendations. Willingness to travel as needed to meet clients and attend industry events.

column2: Job Description: We are seeking a talented and dynamic CRM (Customer Relationship Management) Executive to join our real estate team. As a CRM Executive, you will play a pivotal role in managing our relationships with existing and potential clients, ensuring seamless communication and exceptional service delivery throughout their journey with us. Responsibilities: Client Relationship Management:  Build and maintain strong relationships with clients through regular communication via phone, email, and in-person meetings. Act as the primary point of contact for all client inquiries, concerns, and feedback. Database Management:  Maintain and update the CRM database with accurate client information, interactions, and preferences. Ensure data integrity and confidentiality at all times. Lead Generation and Follow-up:  Assist in generating leads through various channels such as online inquiries, referrals, and marketing campaigns. Follow up promptly with leads to understand their requirements and provide relevant information about our real estate offerings. Customer Service:  Provide excellent customer service by addressing client queries, resolving issues, and ensuring timely responses to all inquiries. Proactively anticipate client needs and offer personalized solutions to enhance their experience. Sales Support:  Collaborate with the sales team to provide them with necessary client insights and support materials. Assist in coordinating property viewings, preparing contracts, and facilitating the sales process as needed. Reporting and Analysis:  Prepare regular reports on client engagement metrics, lead conversion rates, and sales performance. Analyze data to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement in the CRM strategy. Training and Development:  Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and CRM software advancements. Participate in training sessions and workshops to enhance your skills and knowledge in customer relationship management. Skills & Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field. Proven experience in customer relationship management, preferably in the real estate industry. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Strong organizational and multitasking abilities. Proficiency in CRM software and Microsoft Office Suite. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. A customer-centric approach with a passion for delivering exceptional service. Attention to detail and a results-driven mindset. Note:  Job location will be Nalasopara and candidates from western line will be prefered.
column11: CRM Management, Client Relationship Management, Payment Followup, Customer Satisfaction, After Sales Service, Service Operations, Follow Ups, Post Sales

column2: The Team Lead - Customer Success plays a crucial role in ensuring our customers success with our products. This involves leading a diverse team, including Customer Success Managers, Customer Success Specialists (Tech Support), and Senior Customer Support Managers. The primary goal is to build a proficient team capable of effectively training and onboarding new customers, while also developing and executing dynamic strategies to achieve the teams objectives.               Key Responsibilities:                     Leadership and Management       : Directly manage the Customer Success and Customer Support teams. This includes setting the vision and strategic plan for Account Management, focusing on driving product adoption, enhancing customer experiences, and fostering growth through gross renewals and net retention improvements.               Customer Success       : Ensure customer satisfaction and product adoption by developing initiatives that provide unique value to customers. Optimise the Customer Journey, identify process gaps, and coordinate with different departments to align efforts towards Customer Success.               Strategic Alignment       : Collaborate closely with sales management to synchronize strategies, renewal forecasting, coverage plans, and identify account opportunities.               Value Addition       : Enhance customer interactions by maintaining insights from a Customer Success Platform and using key metrics to prepare performance reports.               Team Development       : Build, structure, and mentor the team. Define and optimize the customer lifecycle, initiate programs to improve engagement based on customer segmentation, and foster a culture of continuous improvement.               Recruitment and Training       : Actively recruit and develop a high-performing team, driving operational practices to track team and individual performance.                       Expectations:                 The Team Lead will be responsible for developing tactical plans, executing them, and measuring results to ensure client success and satisfaction.         Long-term, the goal is to create reliable, recurring revenue through a successful Customer Success team.                     Qualifications for Team Lead - Customer Success:                     Experience       : Minimum of 3 years in a managerial position in customer success or account management roles, with a strong preference for experience in a SaaS (Software as a Service) environment.               Achievements:       Proven track record of driving Net Promoter Score (NPS) improvement and increasing customer revenue and retention rates in previous roles.               Communication Skills       : Exceptional communication abilities, including crafting impactful presentations and engaging in articulate email correspondence.               Customer Advocacy       : Strong commitment to customer satisfaction, combined with a relentless pursuit of tangible results.               Adaptability:       Agile and adaptable in a dynamic, fast-paced startup culture, capable of quickly reprioritizing tasks as needed.               Goal-Oriented       : Focused on achieving goals, with a disciplined approach to managing processes and adhering to deadlines.               Educational Background       : Bachelor s degree in Communications, Marketing, Business, or a related field. Fluency in English is essential.               Multitasking and Autonomy       : Proficiency in handling multiple tasks simultaneously with a proactive and independent work ethic.               Problem-Solving and Leadership       : Demonstrated resilience in problem-solving and potential for leadership development.               Technical Proficiency       : High level of proficiency in digital tools and software, along with a keenness to embrace and learn new technologies.               Analytical and Collaborative       : Analytical mindset with a focus on process optimization. Thrives in collaborative, deadline-driven environments.

column2: We are looking for a dedicated and customer-centric individual to join our team as a Customer Engagement Manager in India. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and implementing strategies to enhance customer satisfaction, loyalty, and overall engagement. This role requires a combination of strong communication skills, strategic thinking, and a genuine passion for creating positive customer experiences.               Responsibilities:               Customer Relationship Management:       Build and maintain strong relationships with customers, understanding their needs and preferences.     Act as the primary point of contact for customers, addressing inquiries, resolving issues, and ensuring a positive experience.           Engagement Strategy:       Develop and implement customer engagement strategies to enhance brand loyalty and customer satisfaction.     Identify opportunities for upselling and cross-selling based on customer needs and behaviors.           Communication and Outreach:       Lead communication efforts to keep customers informed about product updates, promotions, and relevant information.     Utilize various channels, including email, social media, and newsletters, to engage with customers.           Feedback Collection and Analysis:       Gather customer feedback through surveys, reviews, and other channels.     Analyze feedback to identify trends, areas for improvement, and opportunities to enhance the customer experience.           Customer Advocacy:       Identify and nurture customer advocates who can positively influence others through testimonials, case studies, and referrals.     Develop and maintain a customer advocacy program to showcase positive customer experiences.           Collaboration with Cross-Functional Teams:       Work closely with marketing, sales, and product development teams to align customer engagement efforts with overall business goals.     Collaborate on initiatives that positively impact the customer journey.           Performance Monitoring:       Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) related to customer engagement and satisfaction.     Regularly report on performance metrics and recommend improvements based on data analysis.                   Qualifications:           Bachelors degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field.     Proven experience in customer engagement, account management, customer marketing, or a related role.     Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.     Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.     Familiarity with customer relationship management (CRM) tools.     Ability to work collaboratively in a team and cross-functional environment.

column2: We are seeking a motivated and customer-focused VIP Account Agent to join our team! As a VIP Account Agent, you will be responsible for providing exceptional service and support to our high-value customers, ensuring their satisfaction and loyalty to our brand. Your main objective will be to create personalized experiences, build strong relationships, and exceed expectations at every touch point. Responsibilities: 1. Develop and maintain relationships with high-value customers, acting as their primary point of contact. 2. Understand the unique needs and preferences of each VIP customer, tailoring services and offers accordingly. 3. Proactively engage with VIP customers through various channels (phone calls, emails, chats) to ensure their satisfaction and address any concerns or issues promptly. 4. Monitor customer activity and analyze data to identify opportunities for upselling or cross-selling additional products or services to VIP customers. Requirements: 1. Proven experience in a similar role  or support industry. 2. Excellent communication skills with the ability to build rapport quickly. 3. Strong customer focus with a passion for delivering exceptional service. 4. Ability to multitask effectively while maintaining attention to detail in a fast-paced environment. 5. Problem-solving skills with the ability to think creatively in challenging situations. 6. Flexibility in working hours as some evening or weekend availability may be required. Conditions: 1.Working schedule 2/2 (from 10 am to 10 pm)  2.Salary depends on your expectations and experience (salary payment occurs twice a month) 3.Possibility of growth 4.Paid training is provided We are also looking for candidates with experience in chat support and non voice process If you are an enthusiastic professional who thrives on building relationships and providing top-notch service, we would love to hear from you. Join our team as a VIP Account Agent and play a pivotal role in ensuring our high-value customers receive the VIP treatment they deserve.

column2: Role Description This is a full-time on-site role for an Immigration Consultant located in Bengaluru. The Immigration Consultant will be responsible for handling immigration related to, visas, global immigration, and law-related matters on behalf of clients. The Immigration Consultant should stay up to date with any changes happening in the countries where the firm provides immigration services and appropriately advises clients. The Immigration Consultant will be responsible for creating a successful strategy. Ability to explain various visa processes, helping the clients to understand immigration procedures for Canada, Australia, etc. Countries. Advice On The Overseas Options Available, To Enable The Candidates & Their Family Makes An Educated Choice & The Right Decision. Call Potential Customers Through Daily Assigned Leads And Secure Appointments For The Week. Give Clear And Accurate Information Based On The Current Immigration & Visa Laws & Policies. Provide A Fair And Neutral Evaluation Of A Candidates Profile. Provide A Personal Global Career Strategy Customized To Their Needs. Achieve Excellent Customer Service By Proactively Responding To Client Queries And Advising Customers On Their Overseas Immigration And Visa Needs. Describe Different Visa Application Process, Benefits And Special Offers To Clients. Must Have Experience In Student Visa Counselor, Sales, University Selection For Canada Country. Regular Follow Up On Enquiries Received. Identify, Resolve Queries & Handling Objections Of Clients. Maximum Achievement Of Goals And Service Levels. Effective Pipeline Management. Able To Achieve Monthly Target. Any Added Responsibility Assigned By Superiors To Enhance More Ability. Counselling The Candidate As Per Their Eligibility And Requirement Calling On Various Leads Database To Generate And Convert Attend Telephonic Queries And Convert Telephonic Queries In Walk-Ins Handling Client Interactions Qualifications Knowledge of immigration law and regulations Expertise in handling visas and other immigration issues Prior consulting experience with global immigration  Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities Interpersonal and communication skills to work well with clients, and cross-functional teams Ability to work efficiently under pressure and handle complex cases Familiarity with the immigration sales of countries like Canada, Australia, Germany and New Zealand Job Profile 1. - Immigration  Consultant  Education -Any Graduation/ Any post graduate/ Any Diploma Experience - Min. 1 or more years in immigration Counseling Age:  Anyone can apply  ( Male - Female Both Can Apply ) Openings  : Jayanagar, Rajajinagar, Marathahallli & Yelahanka Jayanagar:  4th floor, HM Zeta,11th Main Rd, above Burger King,4th T Block East,4th Block, Jayanagar, Karnataka- 560011 Drop your resumes & also contact to the below number if interested Anusha N Contact No.:- 8951870100 Email Id: anusha.n@texasreview.in

column2: Role & responsibilities   Job Title: Inside Sales Executive* *Company:* FAB Hotels   *Location:* Gurgaon Sector 20   *Salary:* 3-4 LPA   *Experience:* Minimum 6 months   *Language:* Fluent English   *Gender:* Male/Female   *Qualification:* 12th Pass   *Job Description:* As an Inside Sales Executive at FAB Hotels, you will be responsible for driving revenue growth through effective communication and sales strategies. Your primary focus will be on generating sales leads, nurturing client relationships, and closing deals within the hospitality industry.  *Responsibilities:* 1. Proactively seek out new sales opportunities through cold calling, networking, and lead generation. 2. Understand customer needs and requirements, and effectively communicate how FAB Hotels' services can meet those needs. 3. Manage and maintain a pipeline of potential clients, ensuring timely follow-up and closure of deals. 4. Provide exceptional customer service to existing and potential clients, addressing any inquiries or concerns promptly and professionally. 5. Collaborate with the sales team to develop and implement strategies for achieving sales targets and objectives. 6. Stay updated on industry trends, market conditions, and competitor activities to identify opportunities for growth and improvement. 7. Maintain accurate records of sales activities, including customer interactions, sales calls, and revenue projections. *Requirements:* 1. Minimum of 6 months of experience in sales, preferably in the hospitality or related industry. 2. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with fluency in English. 3. Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets and objectives. 4. Strong negotiation and closing skills, with the ability to build rapport and establish trust with clients. 5. Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with a high degree of self-motivation and initiative. 6. Proficiency in MS Office and CRM software. 7. 12th pass qualification or equivalent. Join FAB Hotels and be part of a dynamic team committed to delivering exceptional service and driving business growth in the hospitality sector. Apply now to embark on an exciting career in sales!  Contact - 7980369491  Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column2: Embark on a transformative career in AI-driven online learning with Knorish.      As an Inside Sales Associate, leverage cutting-edge technology to redefine educational paradigms.      Your mission: to drive sales, champion growth, and leave a lasting imprint on the e-learning domain.              Key Responsibilities    :            Lead Generation    : Innovate and execute strategies to generate and qualify leads.            Product Demonstrations    : Engage potential clients through compelling product presentations.            Solution-Oriented    : Customize solutions to meet and exceed customer expectations.            Sales Goals    : Aggressively meet and surpass sales targets, propelling Knorishs expansion.            Team Collaboration    : Collaborate effectively across diverse teams for optimal customer experience.              Candidate Profile    :            Sales Acumen    : A strong foundation in sales or customer service.            Communication Mastery    : Outstanding interpersonal and communication skills.            Dynamic Agility    : Thrive in rapid-paced, ever-evolving settings.            Target Driven    : Unwavering focus on achieving sales objectives.            Tech Proficiency    : Familiar with CRM software and contemporary sales methodologies.              Benefits    :            Remuneration    : Highly competitive, with lucrative sales-driven incentives.            Career Advancement    : Ample growth opportunities within an expanding company.            Professional Development    : Comprehensive training programs.            Work Culture    : Embrace our collaborative and inclusive ethos.
column11: E-learning, Lead generation, Inside Sales Associate, GIT, Sales, Social networking, Customer service, Customer experience, CRM, Sales achievement

column2: Prospect and qualify potential leads through cold calling and lead generation activities.         Contact prospective clients via telephone to present TradeJini's product and services.         Educate clients on the features and benefits of TradeJini's trading platform and financial products.         Identify client needs and recommend appropriate solutions to meet their investment goals.         Close sales and achieve monthly targets set by the sales manager.         Maintain accurate records of all sales activities and customer interactions in the CRM system.         Follow up with clients to ensure customer satisfaction and build long-term relationships.         Stay informed about market trends, industry developments, and competitor offerings.         Collaborate with the sales team to develop effective sales strategies and achieve collective goals.         Qualifications:         Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, Marketing, or related field preferred.         Proven experience in telesales or a similar role, preferably in the financial services industry.         Strong communication skills with the ability to articulate complex ideas clearly and persuasively.         Excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to build rapport with clients over the phone.         Results-driven with a proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets.         Knowledge of financial markets, trading products, and investment strategies is an asset.         Familiarity with CRM software and sales tools for tracking and managing leads.         Self-motivated with a positive attitude and a passion for sales and customer service.         Ability to work independently as well as part of a collaborative team environment.         Flexibility to adapt to changing priorities and a fast-paced work environment.
column11: Cold calling, Interpersonal skills, Sales, Financial markets, Telesales, Investment strategies, Customer service, Stock market, Financial services, CRM
